41  I_ASSIGN_TO(m_allowApplicationCloseModelCompPtr, m_allowApplicationCloseCompPtr, false);

43  I_ASSIGN(m_uiStartModeAttrPtr, "UiStartMode", "UI mode by application start up.\n0 - normal\n1 - full screen\n2 - minimized\n3 - maximized", false, 0);
